long_description: A panel-loading day pack with a fit designed just for you, the Gregory Maya 18 Pack easily stores and organizes gear for day trips and short outings. Back panel, shoulder straps and hipbelt are sized and shaped for a woman's body; they feature air-mesh to vent and wick away moisture. BioSync(TM) shoulder and waistbelt suspension stretch into an ideal fit, complementing your body's natural motions. On-the-fly, internal compression system allows you to keep the pack compressed and snug against your back; quick-access compression straps are easy to reach. Expandable, stretch-mesh front mesh pocket with 3-point compression lets you stash bulky gear and keep it easily accessible. Zippered, fleece-lined electronics pocket features an internal cargo stabilizer loop that holds valuable electronics in place when the pocket is open. The Gregory Maya 18 Pack is constructed from 70-denier coated nylon for water repellency and durability. Dual hipbelt pockets; side mesh water-bottle pockets; hydration compatible. Closeout.
short_description: A panel-loading day pack with a fit designed just for you, the Gregory Maya 18 Pack easily stores and organizes gear for day trips and short outings.
